body_text:
What is this manga about a boy with special eyes recruited by 3 girls to hunt murderers? Waking up in the hospital after an accident, the boy finds that his eyes become able to see certain people's shadows. Later, it is revealed that those people are murderers, and he gets scouted and recruited by a team of 3 girls to hunt those murderers.
Some examples of murderers:

A woman with a giant eyeball shadow replacing her face. She takes eyeballs off her victims.
A man with a scythe-shaped shadow replacing his head. He was shown eating ramen next to his victims' corpses.

The manga doesn't have an anime, I believe, since it is quite recent. I am quite certain that it was released after 2013. Not a lot of chapters are out. The premise does sound quite a lot like Shinrei Tantei Yakumo or Tsukihime.

Manga about a guy who can see shadows over people's head after an accident The main character got hit by a car and was sent to the hospital. When he got out of the hospital, he noticed that his eyes were able to see some shadow-like thing over some people's head. The main character then followed a guy among those people and found several people all murdered.
There are also three girls, and another girl who tried to kill him.
